players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Day 1 begins.

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Alice.
The villager Alice was found dead.
Beware, Diana is the detective and discovered you're the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
Diana: "Bob is the mafia. Alice was killed last night. Vote Bob to stop the killings."
You: remained silent.
Charlie: "Bob, you killed Alice. Vote Bob."
Charlie: "Bob's silence is suspicious. He didn't speak, but everyone else pointed at him. Vote Bob."
You: remained silent.
Diana: "Bob is mafia. I investigated him. Vote Bob."

Diana: "Bob is the mafia. Alice was killed last night. Vote Bob to stop the killings."

Votes: Bob voted for Diana, Charlie voted for Bob, Diana voted for Bob
Bob was arrested

players.name: Diana
memory: You're Diana, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Alice was found dead.
You investigated Bob and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Beware, Bob knows you're the detective.
Day 1 begins.
You: "Bob is the mafia. Alice was killed last night. Vote Bob to stop the killings."
Bob: remained silent.
Charlie: "Bob, you killed Alice. Vote Bob."
Charlie: "Bob's silence is suspicious. He didn't speak, but everyone else pointed at him. Vote Bob."
Bob: remained silent.
You: "Bob is mafia. I investigated him. Vote Bob."
Votes: Bob voted for Diana, Charlie voted for Bob, Diana voted for Bob
Bob was arrested
